## RenderMarkdownDirective.filterHtml() method

Filters out parts of html that should not be rendered

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
filterHtml(html: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  html | <code>string</code> | Html to be filtered |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<string>`
